text: I'm going to work on some jira issues now, starting with the animations. I'm not sure if there's much more we can do about GIFs (since we're already simply loading a gif in a webview), so I am going to try extracting all the frames and make an AnimationDrawable to see if that improves the look.
Cool, just saw the JIRA comment you made on that one. Sounds like a good plan.
today's build has been distributed on fabric... I'll announce it on the other slack too.

Release notes:
Clear cache on XWalkView before loading
Renamed app title to Gather
Gather splash animation converted to AnimationDrawable
Product Tour link on About screen
More animation delay in gallery cards 2-3
Show an alert when disconnected from network instead of entering app
Lock the navigation drawer from being swiped open
